archimate:Requirement.name: AC-9(3): Previous Logon Notification | Notification of Account Changes
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Notify the user, upon successful logon, of changes to [Assignment: organization-defined security-related characteristics or parameters of the userâ€™s account] during [Assignment: organization-defined time period].

properties.value: Information about changes to security-related account characteristics within a specified time period allows users to recognize if changes were made without their knowledge.
